card.description.heroSatia:
*On play:*
{name} summons *Night Maiden*, a Dragon that leaves the battlefield if {name} dies
card.description.heroNightMaiden: If Satia dies, {name} leaves the battlefield
card.description.heroIgnea: In addition to normal action, {name} may light any enemy row aflame, dealing 1 damage to every affected unit
card.description.heroRider1Famine:
*On play:*
{name} deals {damage} damage to all enemy units
card.description.heroRider2Conquest:
*On play:*
Play *Famine* from your deck. Then, choose an enemy row. {name} attacks all enemies on that row. If there are no enemies left, *Capture* it.
card.description.heroRider3War:
*On play:*
Play *Conquest* from your deck. Then, choose {targets} allies and {targets} enemies to attack each other
card.description.heroRider4Death:
*On play:*
Play *War* from your deck. Then, {name} destroys ALL damaged units with {powerThreshold} Power or less
card.description.unitRavenMessenger: Every *3* turns {name} survives on the board, it draws a card
card.description.unitPossessedVulture: If {name} kills an enemy creature, it gains *+{bonusPower} Power and *+{bonusAttack} Attack
card.description.unitUnfeelingWarrior:
*On turn start:*
If {name} was attacked last turn, he gains *+{bonusPower} Power
card.description.unitForestScout: If {name} did not attack last turn, she deals {bonusDamage} extra damage on her first attack this turn
card.description.unitMadBerserker: Every consecutive attack on the same target deals *3* more damage
card.description.unitSpinningBarbarian: {name} attacks up to 4 closest enemies on target row
card.description.unitChargingKnight:
*Melee Attack:* Deal {attack} Damage

Can *Melee Attack* only after performing a move
card.description.unitTwinBowArcher: {name} always attacks units directly to the left and to the right from the chosen target
card.description.unitVampireFledgling:
Loses {powerLost} Power per turn.

*Melee Attack:* Deal {attack} Damage. If damage is not blocked, then Restore {powerDrained} Power
card.description.unitPriestessOfAedine:
*Deploy:*
Restore {healing} Power to a damaged allied unit
card.description.unitTreeOfLife:
When Long-Branched Tree enters the battlefield, *Stages of Apocalypse* start to happen every turn.

*Stage 1:* Babies are now born dead

*Stage 2:* Blizzard is not shit anymore

*Stage 3:* Coop games become popular again

*Stage 4:* Everyone dies
card.description.unitSupplyWagon:
*Support:*
Grant an allied unit an extra move action this turn only
card.description.unitArcaneCrystal:
Generates {chargePerMana} *Charge* for every Mana you spend.

*Deathrattle:* Generate {manaGenerated} Mana for every {chargesForMana} *Charges* accumulated.

Charges accumulated: {charges} Will generate {potentialMana} Mana
card.description.unitFlameTouchCrystal:
Generates {chargePerMana} *Charge* for every Mana you spend.

*Deathrattle:* Create a *Tiny Sparkling* for each *Charge* accumulated.

Charges accumulated: {charges}
card.description.unitIceSkinCrystal:
Generates {chargePerMana} *Charge* for every Mana you spend.

*Deathrattle:* Give all adjacent allies {armorGranted} Decaying Armor for every {chargesForArmor} *Charges* accumulated.

Charges accumulated: {charges} Will grant {potentialArmor} Decaying Armor
card.description.spellSpark:
*Hero Power*

Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit
card.description.spellSpeedPotion:
*Hero Power*

Grant an allied unit {moves} extra move actions this turn only
card.description.spellRainOfFire:
{name} deals {damage} damage to {targets} enemy units
Then, it draws a card
card.description.spellMagicalStarfall:
{name} increases Power of all allies units by *3* and Attack by *2*
Then, it draws a card
